verbs.description: Lawyers for President Trump 's former Campaign Manager Corey Lewandowski [V: have] fired off a demand letter to New York Magazine for the alleged ' criminal acts ' of its reporter Olivia Nuzzi .

[ARG0: Lawyers for President Trump 's former Campaign Manager Corey Lewandowski] have [V: fired] off [ARG1: a demand letter to New York Magazine for the alleged ' criminal acts ' of its reporter Olivia Nuzzi] .
